OOC: yah... 25 shots everytime is way extreme even if it is with in the rules.

Astroblast having transformed into shuttle mode already, opens 
a comm-link to Killfest and EndBringer, "Looks like a retreat this time, 
are you coming?" He swoops towards Motormaster catching him in 
his hatch.

On 10 Feb 2001, at 17:39, Robert Dahl wrote:

> OOC: out of curiousity, how come you fire 25 shots every time?
> 
> Motormaster looks at the oncoming assault and tries to fly downwards to
> avoid it, but he dosent have the speed, as the first wave of firepower is
> upon him it tears into his armor, but he stands his ground gritting his
> teeth, until the first of the second waved hit him, from the impact he is
> sent bareling downwards from his position (and therefore the res 500 or so
> shots) his hard armor severely pierced, for the first time on the planet
> Motormaster has been slowed, "owww, these ones can hit," as he strugles to
> stay conscious and barrels through  space towards the earth.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
